text: læa cng klaw theid (muhammad) sacthrrm nan ma cak phraphupenceakhxng phwk cea dangnan phu dı prasngkh k cng sraththa læa phu dı prasngkh k cng ptiseth thæcring rea di teriym fi nrk wi sahrab phwk xthrrm sung kaphæng khxng man lxm rxb phwk khea læa tha phwk khea rxngkhx khwam chwyhelux k ca thuk chwyhelux dwy na semuxn na thxngdæng deuxd lwk bıhna man pen na dum thi chawcha læa pen thi phanak thi lew ray
